meta_description: Learn about the art in the Muskegon Museum of Art's Permanent Collection, discover current and upcoming events and exhibitions, and more.
hours_text:
## 

**MMA** de for you.

[Home](http://web.archive.org/web/20260108011456/https://muskegonartmuseum.org/) __ Visit

## Visit MMA

### Hours

  * 11 AM – 5 PM: Sunday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday & Saturday (second Saturday of every month, free admission*)
  * 11 AM – 8 PM: Thursday (free general admission**)
  * CLOSED: Monday

*Thanks to a generous contribution from Howmet Aerospace, anyone may visit the MMA for free the second Saturday of every month (except in June). Select special exhibitions will require an additional ticket purchase.

**Thanks to a generous contribution from The Meijer Foundation, the MMA is free every Thursday and open until 8 PM. Select special exhibitions may require an additional ticket purchase.

The MMA is closed annually for the following holidays: Easter Sunday, Memorial Day, second Saturday in June, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, New Year’s Eve & New Year’s Day.

[Home](http://web.archive.org/web/20260108011456/https://muskegonartmuseum.org/) __ Visit

### General Admission

  * FREE | [Members](http://web.archive.org/web/20260108011456/https://muskegonartmuseum.org/join-give/)*
  * $12 | Adult*
  * $8 | Seniors (65+)*
  * $6 | Students (17+ with ID)*
  * FREE | Children (16 & under)*

Every Thursday is FREE general admission* (Thanks to The Meijer Foundation)

Every second Saturday is FREE general admission* (Thanks to Howmet Aerospace)

*Select special exhibitions, fundraisers, and events require addi...

accessibility_text:
## Diversity, equity, accessibility, and inclusion at the MMA

Learn more about the MMA’s commitment to making the Museum a safe and welcoming place for everyone in our community, and let us know if there’s something we might have missed!

The Muskegon Museum of Art is committed to making our exhibitions, programs, and facilities welcoming, safe, and accessible for everyone in our community. If you have questions or would like to receive additional info about accessibility at the Muskegon Museum of Art, please contact [[email protected]](/web/20260108011433/https://muskegonartmuseum.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#1360677c6176537e66607876747c7d7261677e666076667e3d7c6174) or [231-720-2570](http://web.archive.org/web/20260108011433/tel:+12317202570).

### Accessibility

#### **All-Gender and Accessible Restrooms**

An all-gender restroom is available on the [second floor](http://web.archive.org/web/20260108011433/https://muskegonartmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/MMA-SECOND-LEVEL-MAP.pdf), in between Alcoa Gallery and Operhall Gallery. This restroom is available during all public and private events, as well as during regular Museum hours. We encourage all guests to use the restroom in which they are most comfortable.

#### **Personal Care Attendants**

Professional personal care attendants are admitted to the Museum free of charge.

#### **Free or Reduced Admission**

General admission at the Museum is FREE every Thursday, 11 a.m. – 8 p.m. thanks to The Meijer Foundation, ...
